reviews.review: Jogo bão, mesmo tanto tempo depois de já enjoar, mais uma vez estou aqui pagando prime pra jogar com os amigos.

Я потратил на это лучшие годы своей жизни

its ok, always going to be a classic of course. But the cheating is something else unless you pay for prime, and even then it can be iffy. A close second to cheaters is one of THE most toxic playerbases EVER, not even exaggerating. Teammates will literally flame their entire team even if you're up 15:1 lel. 

Aside from that, it's a very fun shooter to get into with quite a learning curve so you'll have guns to learn and grenades and all that good stuff, if that's your thing. 

Taking that into consideration, I'd strongly recommend playing this with at least 2 more friends to maximise the fun you can have in matchmaking :)

Good luck have fun!
One of the best shooting games.
